Dashboard

Sidebar {.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### cran.rstudio.com

The streaming data is a 1-week-delayed livestream of download
logs from  cran.rstudio.com. The server code for that service is at [jcheng5/cransim](https://github.com/jcheng5/cransim).


```{r}

```

```{r}
renderValueBox({

})
```

```{r}
renderValueBox({

```

### Unique users {.value-box}

```{r}
})
```
